thread.title: Underage rider and kin killed in crash
thread.title_full: Underage rider and kin killed in crash - Nation | The Star Online

author: thestar.com.my
title: Underage rider and kin killed in crash
text:
ALOR SETAR: An underage motorcyclist and his pillion rider were killed in a head-on collision with a lorry in Sungai Limau Dalam, Yan, about 30km from here.
Muhammad Muhaimin Mohd Noruddin, 15, and Zabri Mohd Supian, 37, died on the spot in the accident which occurred at 11am yesterday.
Yan district police chief Deputy Supt Muhd Halim Yatim said both were not wearing crash helmets and did not possess a licence to ride motorcycles.
“They were coming from Sungai Limau Luar and heading to Sungai Limau Dalam when the rider lost control. 
“The motorcycle skidded into the opposite lane and was rammed by a lorry,” he said, adding that the 30-year-old lorry driver sustained light injuries.
Muhammad Muhaimin’s uncle, Abdullah Mohd Hussain, 49, said the boy stayed with him in Sungai Limau Dalam for three days before the accident.
“He was studying at a boarding school in Kubur Panjang in Pendang and asked me to make arrangements to switch to a boarding school in Sungai Limau,” he said at the Yan Hospital mortuary.
He said Zabri, from Melor in Kelantan, did not know how to ride a motorcycle.
“Zabri was single and the oldest of six siblings,” Abdullah said, adding that a cousin of Muhammad Muhaimin was married to Zabri’s younger brother.
He said his nephew, from Langgar near here, was the oldest of three siblings whose father died a few years ago.
